= !WindowSize property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJConsoleApp_.

*Class:* _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_.

*Introduced:* v2.0

{{{
property WindowSize: TSize;
}}}

== Description ==

This property specifies the size of the window, in pixels, that is used to display a console application. If either dimension is <= zero then the default window size is used.

If a console application shares a console this property has no effect.

The property defaults to (0, 0).

*Note:* A function named _!MakeSize_ is provided to create a _TSize_ record with specified values on the fly. This should be used when setting the property value since the _cx_ and _cy_ fields of _!WindowSize_ cannot be written to directly.
